#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<string>
using namespace std;

int scanint(){
	register int c = getchar();
	int x=0;
	bool neg=false;
	for(;(c<48 || c>57) && c!=45 ;c=getchar());
	if(c==45){
		neg=true;
		c=getchar();
	}
	for(;c>47 && c<58;c=getchar())
	{
		x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-48;
	}
	if(neg==true)
	x=x*(-1);
	return x;
}

long long scanlong()
{
	register int c = getchar();
	long long x=0;
	for(;(c<48 || c>57);c=getchar());
	for(;c>47 && c<58;c=getchar())
	{
		x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-48;
	}
	return x;
}

typedef long long ll;
typedef unsigned long long ull;

ll S(ll n){
	ll ans = 0;
	int r;
	while(n){
		r = n%10;
		if(r & 1){
			ans+=r;
		}else{
			ans+=(r*2);
		}
		n/=10;
	}
	return ans;
}

int D(ll n){
	return S(n)%10;
}

ll f(ll n , ll a){
	ll ans = 0 , k = 0;
	int d = D(n);
	while(k <= a){
		ans += (d+D(k))%10;
		k++;
	}
	return ans;
}

int main(){
	int t;
	ll a,b,pa,pb,ra,rb;
	ll ans;
	t = scanint();
	while(t--){
		a = scanlong();
		b = scanlong();
		ra = rb = 0;
		if(a != 0){
			a--;
			pa = a - (a%10);
			ra = 45 * (pa/10);
			ra += f(pa , (a%10));	
		}
		
		pb = b - (b%10);
		rb = 45 * (pb/10);
		rb += f(pb , (b%10));
		ans = rb - ra;
		cout<<ans<<endl;
	}
}
